item.title: Identify the NIC driver and supported driver version for an ESXi server
item.description: Lately, I troubleshooted some NIC driver problems in VMware ESXi. During the troubleshooting, I needed to Identify the NIC driver, the software version used, and the latest driver version supported by VMware. Here are the steps outlined. Identify the NIC driver and software version: Make an SSH connection to the ESXi host Identify all the NICs by using the following command: esxcli network nic list In this example you can see that Intel (igb) and Broadcom (tg3) NICs are used.
